description: Adashino Benio became the young heir of the Adashino family after her parents died. Her speciality is astronomy. She likes exorcists, family and ohagi. She hates http://anidb.net/ch81478 [Kamui] and spicy food. She used to be a cheerful girl until her parents were killed, which prompted her to close her heart and train diligently as an exorcist in order to exact vengeance upon http://anidb.net/ch81478 [Kamui]. She initially disliked http://anidb.net/ch78912 [Rokuro] but reconciliated with him after she became aware of her brother`s true nature.
name: Adashino Benio
